snippet: A planned replacement for the Tappan Zee Bridge could nearly triple the existing toll to $14, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s administration said Friday.
abstract: Gov Andrew M Cuomo administration officials say that a planned replacement for the Tappan Zee Bridge, which crosses the Hudson River between Westchester and Rockland Counties, could nearly triple the existing $5 toll to $14.
lead_paragraph: A planned replacement for the Tappan Zee Bridge could nearly triple the existing toll to $14, Gov. Andrew M. Cuomo’s administration said Friday.

headline.seo: Toll at New Tappan Zee Bridge Could Be $14
headline.main: Toll at New Tappan Zee May Be $14
headline.print_headline: Toll at New Tappan Zee May Be $14
